name: Mailbox Money
shortDescription: Manage avatars, track finances, and explore a quirky postal-themed world in this fun RPG simulation.
fullDescription: Mailbox Money is a playful RPG where you manage multiple avatars and their finances within a whimsical postal-themed world. Customize avatars, monitor deposits, add notes, and enjoy a charming environment filled with a friendly postman, flying coins, and mailboxes.
